app.title: Videa: AI Video Maker, Effects
app.description:
Videa: Revolutionize Your Content Creation with Advanced Video Generation

Unleash your creativity with Videa, the ultimate tool for transforming your ideas into captivating videos. Whether youâ€™re a content creator, social media enthusiast, or just exploring your creative side, Videa puts the power of video generation at your fingertips. Forget complicated softwareâ€”create professional-quality videos effortlessly, no prior editing experience required!

Powered by cutting-edge artificial intelligence, Videa simplifies video creation, enabling anyone to produce stunning, share-worthy content in minutes.

ðŸš€ Key Features

ðŸ”¹ AI Hug
Blend two photos into a heartwarming embrace. Celebrate love, family, or friendships with this touching feature.

ðŸ”¹ AI Kiss
Create romantic scenes effortlessly. Upload two photos, and Videa crafts a magical kiss momentâ€”perfect for anniversaries or heartfelt memories.

ðŸ”¹ Super Heroes Transformation
Turn yourself or others into iconic superheroes with AI-powered effects. Upload a photo and watch as Videa creates action-packed transformations.

ðŸ”¹ Dancing Videos
Bring still photos to life with realistic dance animations. Add rhythm and energy to your content for unforgettable, shareable clips.

ðŸ”¹ Text to Video
Transform simple text prompts into dynamic video stories. From slideshows to animated reels, Videa makes storytelling effortless.

ðŸ”¹ Artistic Filters & Styles
Elevate your videos with a variety of cinematic and artistic filters. Instantly give your projects a professional and polished look.

âœ¨ Why Choose Videa?

âœ” Effortless Video Generation â€“ Advanced AI ensures stunning results with minimal effort.
âœ” Fast & Intuitive â€“ Create professional-quality videos in just minutes with a simple interface.
âœ” Versatile Tools â€“ From superhero transformations to heartfelt AI-generated hugs, Videa has it all.
âœ” Cutting-Edge AI â€“ Enjoy vibrant effects, realistic animations, and polished results powered by advanced technology.
âœ” Social Media Ready â€“ Seamlessly create and share content on Instagram, TikTok, YouTube, and more.

ðŸ“± Social Media Content â€“ Create engaging videos for TikTok, Instagram, or YouTube Shorts that grab attention.

ðŸŽ‰ Memorable Creations â€“ Celebrate birthdays, anniversaries, or holidays with personalized videos.
ðŸŽ¨ Creative Projects â€“ Let your imagination shine with tools that bring your ideas to life.

ðŸ‘¥ Who Is Videa For?

Whether youâ€™re a creator, marketer, or someone who loves sharing memories, Videa is designed to make video creation simple, fast, and fun. Its powerful tools help you create, edit, and share stunning videos effortlessly.

ðŸŒŸ Additional Benefits

âœ… No Experience Needed â€“ Perfect for beginners and professionals alike.
âœ… Create Anywhere â€“ Design videos anytime, anywhere, directly from your mobile device.

âœ… Save Time â€“ Let AI handle complex tasks while you focus on creativity.

With Videa, video creation becomes simple, enjoyable, and rewarding. Whether youâ€™re crafting social media content, telling stories, or capturing moments, this app empowers you to bring your ideas to life.

app.summary: Video AI: Revolutionize Your Content Creation with Advanced Video Generation

reviews.text: It's so sad that Google allows this app to be here. It's all a scam. the videos you can generate with it are of literally 4 seconds. In some, they don't look at all like you or the person you put in the photo. And of course if all this happens ending the subscription should be hidden, right? well, right. it's super tricky because of course they want your renewal money each week so they put it really hard for you. Please do a favor yourself and don't use this garbage.
reviews.replyText:
Hello Angel,

Thank you for reaching out. We're sorry to hear about your experience with the app. Please contact us at support@videa.pureapps.co with more details so we can address your concerns and assist you with any issues, including canceling your subscription.

Support Team

reviews.text: the AI generated videos are very terrible and also cost an absurd amount for such horribly generated videos, regardless of the style, please do not waste your time downloading this app, or worse and actually pay money to make a video if you downloaded the app.
reviews.replyText:
Hello Moses,

Thank you for reaching out. We are sorry to hear about your experience with the AI-generated videos. Please contact us at support@videa.pureapps.app with more details so we can assist you and work to improve your experience with the app.

Support Team

reviews.text: no trial, asks for a review soon as opened, tries to trick you to subscribe by hiding the close x with a blended background like other apps try to do. Google should do more about these forceware apps. uninstalled, plenty of other free uses per day programs.
reviews.replyText:
Hello Chad,

Thank you for reaching out. We apologize for your experience. Your feedback is valuable, and we're continually looking to improve. If you have specific questions or need assistance, please contact us at support@videa.pureapps.co .

Support Team

reviews.text: absolute scam. you pay for a years subscription expecting to be able to use it as much as you want for a year. but it gives you credits (which run out after about 20 videos). shocking app, want a refund.
reviews.replyText:
Hello,
Please note that all our payments are being managed by Google Play. For refund requests please use the link below to contact Google Play support:
https://support.google.com/googleplay/answer/2479637?sjid=3002695109083128966-EU&hl=en#apps
Thank you.

reviews.text: Doesn't even allow me to see all pictures in my gallery. I see about 20 from each of my albums and can't scroll any further. Don't know if it's a user error on my part or something that isn't supposed to happen even after allowing all access to my gallery. Also didn't even open the app for 10 seconds and got 5 ads just for the first 4 scrolls of introducing the app. It happens every time I opened the app too. I gave up and uninstalled. (Can't import the image I wanted to actually use)
reviews.replyText:
Hello Angie,

We're sorry to hear about the issues with accessing your gallery and the ad frequency. Please try reinstalling the app to see if it resolves the problem. If the issue persists, contact us at support@videa.pureapps.co with more details, and weâ€™ll be happy to assist you.

Best regards,
Support Team

reviews.text: This app is terrible. The faces are always changing, and I'm one I look like the the bearded lady or like if I'm In a bondage program. none of them look like the subjects in the pictures. i would give it 0 stars, but that isn't an option. Don't download this. Don't waste money.
reviews.replyText:
Hello Cyndi,

Thank you for reaching out. We're sorry to hear that the results didn't meet your expectations. Please contact us at support@videa.pureapps.co with more details and any examples you can provide, so we can look into the issue and assist you better.

Support Team

reviews.text: The videos are ok. The AI can only understand and do so much. You have to test and try it out, I bought a yearly subscription because I thought, like every other subscription, the credits would regenerate daily or weekly. But I found out the don't regenerate at all. So to even get good at this tool you have to spend lots of money. But I can spend that same amount of money on Google labs and practically get unlimited time for the projects I'm doing. I really thought it wobe helpful but it is not.
reviews.replyText:
Hello Taurus,

We apologize for any confusion about the coin system. With a subscription, credits are renewed monthly, not daily or weekly, to manage resource use. Your feedback is important, and we'll consider it for improvements. If you have more questions, please contact us at support@videa.pureapps.co.

Best regards,
Support Team

reviews.text: very cool app. I just can't quite justify the monthly price vs how much I'll actually use it. I think it would be better if you could purchase the tokens to use as opposed to a monthly or weekly subscription

although I buy Pro but still not able to create any video. fake app. After purchase I wrote a mail to support team. they says may be I used all coins. Ha ha ha without using app. where as they claim full access for 1 week. cheater. Support everytime claims that they resolved the problem but actually they just want to pass subscription period.
animated a recent photo, and I was impressed at the picture results. I haven't tried them all, but I recommend you try the app it's only 2.99 to try
reviews.replyText:
Hello Chris,

Thank you for reaching out. We're thrilled to hear that you were impressed with the animation results! If you have any questions or need further assistance as you explore more features, feel free to contact us at support@videa.pureapps.co .

Support Team

app.AIReview:
Videa: AI Video Maker, Effects â€“ A Comprehensive Review

Overview

Videa: AI Video Maker, Effects is an iOS application positioned within the Art & Design category, aiming to democratize video creation through artificial intelligence. With over 1.19 million installs and a solid 4.4-star rating from 20,564 users, it has quickly gained traction as a tool for individuals seeking to generate professional-looking videos without extensive editing experience or specialized software. The appâ€™s core proposition revolves around leveraging AI to transform ideas into engaging content â€“ a promise that demands careful scrutiny given the current landscape of AI-powered creative tools. The free version offers access to many features, encouraging widespread adoption while potentially monetizing through premium subscriptions.

Key Features

Videa boasts a robust feature set designed for ease of use and rapid video creation. Central to its functionality are:

  • AI Video Generation: The app's primary function utilizes AI to generate videos based on text prompts. Users input their desired theme, style, and even specific elements they want included.
  • Template Library: Videa offers a diverse collection of pre-designed video templates categorized by industry (e.g., marketing, social media, education) and content type (e.g., promotional videos, explainer videos, cinematic trailers).
  • Stock Footage & Music Integration: Seamlessly incorporate royalty-free stock footage and music directly into your generated or customized videos. The app provides a curated library to choose from.
  • Text-to-Speech Functionality: Convert text captions into realistic voiceovers using the built-in Text-to-Speech feature, offering flexibility for creating educational or promotional content.
  • Effects & Transitions: A selection of visual effects and transitions allow users to add polish and dynamism to their videos. These range from subtle animations to more dramatic transformations.
  • Customization Options: Users can adjust parameters like video length, aspect ratio (9:16 for mobile platforms), resolution, and speed to tailor the output to specific needs.
  • Brand Kit Feature: Allows users to upload logos, color palettes, and fonts for consistent branding across all generated videos.

Strengths

Videa's strengths lie primarily in its accessibility and speed of video creation:

  • Ease of Use: The intuitive interface makes the app remarkably easy to learn, even for complete beginners with no prior video editing experience. The drag-and-drop functionality and guided prompts streamline the process significantly.
  • Rapid Content Creation: AI-powered generation dramatically reduces the time required to produce videos compared to traditional methods involving complex software and manual editing. Users can create a basic video in under a minute.
  • Diverse Template Library: The extensive template collection caters to a wide range of content needs, offering a solid starting point for users who aren't sure where to begin.
  • Free Version Accessibility: The free version provides substantial functionality, allowing users to experiment with the appâ€™s capabilities before committing to a paid subscription.

Areas for Improvement

Despite its strengths, Videa has several areas that could be improved:

  • AI Output Quality Variance: The quality of AI-generated videos can vary significantly depending on the clarity and specificity of the input prompts. Ambiguous or overly complex prompts frequently result in less desirable outcomes.
  • Limited Customization Beyond Templates: While customization options exist, they are somewhat constrained compared to traditional video editing software. Users seeking highly bespoke visuals might find themselves limited.
  • Music Library Restrictions: The quality and selection within the music library could be expanded. The current offerings feel somewhat basic, potentially impacting the overall professional appearance of videos.
  • Lack of Advanced Editing Tools: For users who want more control over their video projects, Videa lacks advanced editing features such as color correction, multi-track audio editing, or complex masking effects.

User Experience

The user experience is generally positive, characterized by a clean and uncluttered interface. The appâ€™s onboarding process is well-designed, guiding new users through the core functionalities with helpful tutorials. Navigation is intuitive, allowing users to seamlessly switch between generating videos, browsing templates, accessing stock assets, and customizing their creations. However, some users have reported occasional lag when generating larger or more complex videos, potentially indicating a strain on device resources.

Value for Money

The appâ€™s free version offers significant value, enabling users to explore its features and create basic videos without financial commitment. The premium subscription unlocks additional templates, higher-resolution exports, removes watermarks, and provides access to exclusive stock assets. Pricing information isn't explicitly displayed within the app itself, requiring users to navigate to the App Store to view subscription options (typically a monthly or annual fee). Considering the potential time savings and ease of use, the premium subscription represents reasonable value for those who plan on regularly creating high-quality videos.

Conclusion

Videa: AI Video Maker, Effects is a compelling entry into the growing market of AI-powered content creation tools. Its intuitive interface, rapid video generation capabilities, and extensive template library make it an excellent choice for beginners or anyone seeking a quick and efficient way to produce visually engaging content. While there are limitations regarding AI output consistency and advanced editing features, the free version provides ample opportunity to evaluate its suitability for your needs. Moving forward, improvements in AI model training could significantly enhance video quality, while expanding the music library and refining customization controls would further solidify Videa's position as a leading tool in this evolving space. Itâ€™s a worthwhile download for anyone curious about exploring AI-driven video creation.
